cetus.application

Interface UseDefChain

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    IPChainAnalysis

    public interface UseDefChain
    A class that implements UseDefChain provides the Use-Def chain information which is computed from the control flow graph.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Set<DFANode> getDefDFANodeSet(Expression use)
      Returns interprocedural definition list as list of DFANode in the control flow graph
      java.util.List<Traversable> getDefList(Expression use)
      Returns interprocedural definition list.
      java.util.List<Traversable> getLocalDefList(Expression use)
      Returns intraprocedural defintion list
